General.Name: LuxNet
General.Description: LuxNet Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, processes, and sells electric components and active components for optical communication in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. It is also involved in the retail sale of electronic materials. The company offers laser and photo diode chips, transmitters, receivers, and optical sub-assemblies. Its products are used in high-speed voice video and data communications for networking, storage, and cable TV applications. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 6, Hejiang Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 32061
